code: protected void checkRequest(String expect, String request) {     if (expect.equals(ECHO_REQUEST)) {         // just check the namespace of xsd         assertTrue("Expect to find the namesapce", request.indexOf("xmlns:xsd=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema\"") > 0).     } }

@Test public void testInvokingServiceFromClient() throws Exception {     // just send a request which has all the namespace in the soap header     HttpPost post = new HttpPost(simpleEndpointAddress).     post.addHeader("Accept", "text/xml").     StringEntity entity = new StringEntity(ECHO_REQUEST, ContentType.create("text/xml", "ISO-8859-1")).     post.setEntity(entity).     CloseableHttpClient httpclient = HttpClientBuilder.create().build().     try {         HttpResponse response = httpclient.execute(post).         assertEquals(200, response.getStatusLine().getStatusCode()).         String responseBody = EntityUtils.toString(response.getEntity()).         assertEquals("Get a wrong response", ECHO_RESPONSE, responseBody).     } finally {         httpclient.close().     } }
